Articles.Content: So I just got kerbal space program yesterday on the ps4 and have been having the time of my life until it started freezing Whenever I launched a couple of space ships (and they crashed into the ground) and went back to build some more but the my screen just froze I could still hear the background music but no movement and I had to restart and all my rockets were gone This keeps happening more and more and I can't enjoy the game HELP

Basically your going to have to wait for a patch the entire thing is a fing mess, squad should be embarrassed about the entire thing. Great introduction to console users, here enjoy our game for a few hours until it starts crashing, freezing and corrupting your save data.

Quote

The release processes on console and PC are quite different, and the console builds are based off of the PC ones. When we want to patch the consoles we merge PC commits and work on the custom code and assets that are needed to make it run on the consoles. The console builds then have to go through certification with the console manufacturer (Sony, Microsoft or Nintendo) before we can make them available. As a result the consoles are likely to run a little bit behind compared to the PC releases, but we will keep updating all platforms as we move forward.

[who cares]

Edited August 16, 2016 by Violent Jeb
